website_summaries.verdict: For less than $900, this 17.3-inch version of Acer's Nitro 5 bargain gaming rig plays top games at top quality settings at close to 60fps. Its screen is merely adequate, but the laptop as a whole is a great value.
pros: Solid 1080p gaming and a giant display at a low price
cons: No SD card slot or Thunderbolt 3 port

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop 🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.text: I have the i5 9300h and gtx 1660 ti and i can say that 98% of the most graphic demanding games you can run them maxed out.Games like (GTA 5/Forza Horizon 4/Nfs Payback/Ride 3/BF5/Ace Combat 7 etc) runs maxed out 60 fps+.The heat is good cpu around 75-80c and gpu 68 after long gaming sessions.Yes you can undervolt the cpu and apply some thermal paste on cpu+gpu and have a cooling pad under it and you good to go.Love it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement! Missing part.
customer_reviews.text: Acer Nitro 5 AN515-54 15.6-inch Gaming Laptop - (Intel Core i5-9300H, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD and 1TB HDD, Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650, Full HD Display, Windows 10, Black) Discription says "256gb SSD and 1tb HDD" but no 256ssd! just 1tb. I could add pictures to prove my words But was no option to include photos in this review, "suspiciously" BUT, before open the box find the discription of the item on right side of the box, there written truth that this laptop has only 1tb. I was too trustful and opened the box before reading, so I hope you wont be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Sultonmurod Yusupov

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Rapid startup due to SSD Good graphics, able to run current games at full spec Screen resolution very good Cons: Keyboard layout slightly cramped
customer_reviews.author: T Jones

customer_reviews.title: Internal GPU port fault on arrival. Returning and shopping for another.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this laptop as a gift for my girlfriend as we wanted to play games together. When the time came to open it up we were sorely disappointed to see the screen was broken. No damage to the exterior box or anything and after updating/re-installing all the graphics drivers I plugged in an external monitor to find it working fine on the second monitor. So we ruled out a software issue. After talking to Acer technical support they believe it was a port issue on the internal graphics card so we have no choice but to return the laptop and have to delay her birthday gift. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Morris

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HAVE SOLID STATE DRIVE
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT HAVE SOLID STATE DRIVE. This means that, despite all its other great features, it is not fast enough to play games such as Fortnite (which is what my son wanted it for). We didn't discover this until he started using it to play games and found it far too slow. We then checked the spec. Amazon did let us return it due to being mis-sold, and we have replaced it with a different laptop which does have SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Cat T

customer_reviews.title: Freezes way too much
customer_reviews.text: bought this pc for gaming, it freezes and crashes way too often. it starts pretty well, but after 30 minutes of EASY games (valorant and osu) the pc starts freezing continuously. sometimes it even crashes right in the middle of a gaming session, unacceptable for the specs it offers. it can run heavy games like AC Odyssey but it doesn't even run smoothly, not even in daily tasks like on YT
customer_reviews.author: Jianli

customer_reviews.title: good value for money, title slightly misleading, fans can be slightly loud.
customer_reviews.text: product is great however title is slightly misleading the 1660 ti version infact comes with i5 processor not i7. apart from that great little laptop!
customer_reviews.author: paul white

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is quite bad but overall performance is great!
customer_reviews.text: The gaming laptop is great, although i use it for schoolwork it still has great performance, but as any other laptop the battery life could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Amaan Akhram

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: What you'd expect from a laptop of this price. Would recommend getting an SSD if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldo

customer_reviews.title: Was very slow at refund s do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It was very slow for a game ing pc Not worth the money I payed Very slow to refund me Do not buy It’s over 5 weeks now and still no refund
customer_reviews.author: paul ellis

customer_reviews.title: SUPER VALUE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Acer nitro 5 515-43 Cant go wrong with it after some tweking and seting yes i comfirm good for gaming aver.60fps on most new games on low setings to medium ofc upgrade ram to over 16gb and u rolling !!!! Overal will give 5stars Ps:not a laptop for beginers toset it up!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dawid

customer_reviews.title: Problem with black screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April. But have a problem with the display, it was not working... just black screen. Its working but the screen was black, can't see nothing. I send it back, in the next days, 07 may, and I still waiting for my money...... Yes, after 2 months. Amazon is suck when is to refound your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Muraru

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this and any order that involves Hermes
customer_reviews.text: Would not start after initial setup. Returned but just waiting in the money after 5 days of it going back.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Received laptop with hardware damage and constant blue screening making it completely unusable. Will definitely be returning it. Tried to ring acer support to no response.
customer_reviews.author: Tash392

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with right speaker problem
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed about this laptop slow for a gaming laptop and arrived with problems with right speaker. Returned back
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Costin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but fans are horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the fans started making weird noises after just 3 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: It can run most games
customer_reviews.text: Its a good gaming laptop for the money you pay but u need to upgrade the ram
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The worst laptop ever
customer_reviews.text: The laptop GPU is not working at all, really disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Abdelrahim Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: I've got the i5 9300h and gtx 1660 ti and I can tell that 98% of the most challenging graphic games you can run maxed out. Games like (GTA 5/Forza Horizon 4/Nfs Payback / Ride 3/BF5/Ace Combat 7 etc) run maxed out 60 fps+. Between lengthy gaming sessions, the heat is decent cpu about 75-80c and gpu 68.Yes you can undervolt the processor and add some thermal paste to cpu+gpu and have a cooling pad under it and you're good to go. Love it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mubarak

customer_reviews.title: Gaming and overall use is great
customer_reviews.text: I run this laptop with a external monitor and its brilliant. keep up with most games. The only recommended upgrade I would do it the ram, double it! made a huge difference in GTA Online. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kingpastyboy

product_meta.title: Acer Nitro 5 AN515-43 15.6 Inch Gaming Laptop - (AMD Ryzen 5 3550H Mobile Processor, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, AMD Radeon RX 560X, Full HD Display, Windows 10, Black)
product_meta.description: Style Name:Ryzen 5, RX560Explore and enjoy a new level of gaming with the powerful Nitro 5. The solid, understated design houses a full HD screen and a line-up of impressive tech that enhances every aspect of gameplay and bringing you a more immersive experience. Reign over the game world with the combined power of an AMD Ryzen 5 3350H processor with RX 560X graphics. Explore games in greater detail with the sharp visuals of a 15. 6” FHD IPS display. When heavy use requires an added boost, chill out with twin fans, Acer CoolBoost technology and a dual exhaust port design. CoolBoost increases fan speed by 10% and CPU/GPU cooling by 9% compared to auto mode. Monitor and manage your system in real time with NitroSense, covering temperatures, fan speeds and more. Commands are just a touch away with the dedicated NitroSense Key, while the WASD and arrow keys are highlighted for easy location. Enjoy the tactile feel of keys with a travel distance of 1. 6mm. Add some excitement to your gaming and play in dimly lit environments with the red backlit keyboard. Better audio delivers a competitive edge as well as a more immersive experience. Invigorate your gaming and enjoy crushing audio as Waves MaxxAudio meets Acer TrueHarmony. Get intelligent bass, dialog and volume enhancement with Waves MaxxAudio, and deeper, richer sounds with Acer TrueHarmony. Effortlessly stream your gameplay with Gigabit Wi-Fi 5 with 2x2 MU-MIMO technology. Plug all your peripherals into the full range of ports, including HDMI 2. 0, USB Type-C Gen 1 and more.
feature_bullets: Explore and enjoy a new level of gaming with the powerful Nitro 5
Reign over the game world with the combined power of an AMD Ryzen 5 3350H processor with RX 560X graphics
Explore games in greater detail with the sharp visuals of a 15. 6-inch FHD IPS display
When heavy use requires an added boost, chill out with twin fans, Acer CoolBoost technology and a dual exhaust port design
Monitor and manage your system in real time with NitroSense, covering temperatures, fan speeds and more
